root.title: Quick work

description.p: Dan Robinson has been worried all week.[] Last Tuesday he received a letter from the local police.[] In the letter he was asked to call at the station.[] Dan wondered why he was wanted by the police, but he went to the station yesterday and now he is not worried anymore.[] At the station, he was told by a smiling policeman that his bicycle had been found.[] Five days ago, the policeman told him, the bicycle was picked up in a small village four hundred miles away.[] It is now being sent to his home by train.[] Dan was most surprised when he heard the news.[] He was amused too, because he never expected the bicycle to be found.[] It was stolen twenty years ago when Dan was a boy of fifteen!

root.ch_mean: 破案“神速” 丹.鲁宾逊焦虑了整整一个星期。上星期二他收到当地警察局的一封信，要他到警察局去一趟。丹奇怪警察为什么找他，但昨天还是去了，结果他一再担心了。在警察局里，一位面带笑容的警察告诉他，他的自行车找到了。那位警察对他说，那辆自行车是5天前在400英里外的一个小村里发现的，现在正用火车给他运回家来。丹听到这个消息后，惊奇万分，但又感到非常好笑，因为他从未指望那辆自行车还能找到。这是20年前丹还是一个15岁的孩子时被人偷走的！

question.title: Dan was worried because _________.
question.options: he received a letter [] the police wanted him[]he went to the station yesterday []he didn't know why the police wanted him
question.answer: he didn't know why the police wanted him

question.title: Dan ________.
question.options: had probably forgotten all about his bicycle []probably expected to find his bicycle again []probably expected to get a letter from the police[]was probably sorry to learn that his bicycle had been found
question.answer: had probably forgotten all about his bicycle
